q: Are there grants or rebates for flood-proofing homes?
a: Yes—programs like FEMA HMGP, FMA, and local mitigation grants reimburse up to 75 % of approved costs. Availability varies by county.

q: Who qualifies for FEMA flood-mitigation grants?
a: Homeowners in declared flood zones with repetitive loss history or at risk of future flooding. Local emergency-management offices handle applications.
